info.comment:
-=About=-
For Radar 2, I recieved a tone of complaints about the enemies taking to long to defeat, and the game being really slow. So this is the updated version. Still the same game as Radar 2, but with a few inhancements and changes to help it match up to its precessor.

{Story}
Radar's galaxy has been invaded by strange robots. He must defeat these to save his galaxy from almost certian doom. He soon finds out a rival bounty hunter, Carnage,was payed by a mystery leader to send out them. Radar must defeat Carnage before all hope for his Galaxy is lost.

{Controls}
Arrow Keys/WASD keys: Move
Mouse: Shoot/Aim

-=Updates=-
-WASD Movement
-Layering Updates
-Life/Dying glitch fixed
-Level 2 changed slightly
-Contiue and New Game features
-Locked levels
-Level select screen changed slightly
-Some glitches fixed
-Enemies die faster
-Boss 1/4 of the health as usual, though it shoots more often.
-New Music
-New Main Menu
info.author: 08jackt
